name: Swank
descriptions: Swank is the right-hand man of Benny for the Chairmen in 2281.
Swank has been Benny's right-hand man since Benny took over the Mojave Boot-Riders and were made into the Chairmen.
In All Roads, Swank carries out Benny's orders to poison the Singer with "Vegas" (aka Psycho).
Swank appears in Fallout: New Vegas and All Roads.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Is Benny taken care of yet?

topics.topic_text: I've got evidence that Benny tried to kill me and stole a Platinum Chip from me.
topics.response_text: Whoa, hey now, kid, that's some kind of serious charge you're dropping. You want to be real careful what you say next.

topics.topic_text: I think you should know something about Benny.
topics.response_text: Really? You got something to say about the big boss, huh? Well, why don't you say it to his face instead of yapping at me?

topics.topic_text: Who are you?
topics.response_text: Ain't been on the strip long, have you, pal? Name's Swank. This is my joint.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about the NCR?
topics.response_text: I hear they got their act together out west - like a real old-time country, they tell me.

topics.topic_text: Nice place you've got here. Tell me about it.
topics.response_text: The Tops? Yeah, sure, you want the nickel tour ol' Swank's happy to oblige.

topics.topic_text: Can you give me the rundown on New Vegas?
topics.response_text: Sure, kid, sure. What can I tell you?

topics.topic_text: I'm looking to make a few extra caps. Got any jobs you need done?
topics.response_text: Baby, you stick with me, you won't have to work a day in your life. Don't fret about caps, you just sit there and look pretty for me.

topics.topic_text: Have you seen Benny?
topics.response_text: I saw him heading for his suite just a few minutes ago. Looked like a fox that just got caught in the henhouse. Maybe you'll catch him there.

topics.topic_text: I thought Benny ran this place.
topics.response_text: Benny oversees the business, sure, but I run the Tops day to day. I'm his right-hand guy, you dig?

topics.topic_text: Nice place. Got a minute to talk?
topics.response_text: Sure, kid, sure - I can spare a couple. What can I do for you?

topics.topic_text: Somehow I find that hard to believe.
topics.response_text: Ouch! Come on, baby, don't be that way. You don't know what you're missing.

topics.topic_text: I haven't had a chance to look yet.
topics.response_text: All right, well, might want to get a move on, is all I'm saying.

topics.topic_text: Benny has reprogrammed a Securitron, he's trying to take over the Strip.
topics.response_text: He's what? Ah jeez... jeez, this is really bad. What are you going to do?

topics.topic_text: I thought maybe I'd talk to the man. See if we can work out a deal.
topics.response_text: Yeah? That's ballsy. Good luck with that.

topics.topic_text: Look, I found these cigarette butts by the grave he buried me in.
topics.response_text: Huh. Well, yeah, okay, these are Benny's brand, and they ain't too common. You got anything else?

topics.topic_text: I found this lighter in Boulder City. He dropped it when he killed his partners.
topics.response_text: Yeah, that looks like Benny's lighter all right. Still, not exactly a ton of proof. Got anything else, kid?

topics.topic_text: Here, take a look at this note I found in Novac.
topics.response_text: That's... pretty shady, yeah. Could be Benny's up to no good, could be this is somebody else altogether. What else you got?

topics.topic_text: What's the story with the White Glove Society?
topics.response_text: Creepy bunch of cats, you ask me. Oh, sure, they act all polite and civilized, but there's something off about them, you dig?

topics.topic_text: That's it. What do you think?
topics.response_text: I'll tell you what I think, I think I oughta go tell Benny about this right now - but I'll clam up for now.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Groovy. Here's your stuff back - in case you run into company, you dig? I'll tell the boys to give you a pass to pack some heat.

topics.topic_text: Actually, never mind. It's nothing.
topics.response_text: Yeah, thought so. You're a smart kid, you know that?

topics.topic_text: We don't have time for that. We need to take him out right now.
topics.response_text: Take him out? Jesus... okay, well, if you think that's the best way to deal with this. I'll send him up to his room, you can ambush him there.

topics.topic_text: I don't think you're going to like it. Seems Benny's been making his own play.
topics.response_text: Huh? What are you talking about?

topics.topic_text: Ha ha! Take it easy, pal, I'm just pulling your leg. Honest.
topics.response_text: Anybody ever tell you your sense of humor stinks? I'll let it go this time, but you watch your mouth from now on.

topics.topic_text: Go ahead, see if I care.
topics.response_text: Pal, you're gonna regret that for the rest of your very short life.

topics.topic_text: Benny tried to kill me and stole a platinum chip I was hired to deliver.
topics.response_text: That doesn't... why would he pull a stunt like that? Got anything else to offer?

topics.topic_text: He tried to make it look like an accident - just a traveler killed and robbed in the Wasteland.
topics.response_text: He's trying to pull a fast one on the big man? Crazy bastard. You got any more?

topics.topic_text: Benny must think this chip will allow him to seize power on the Strip.
topics.response_text: Jesus, I can't even believe it. After all House did to set us up with this swank joint. I don't suppose there's more?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about the Omertas.
topics.response_text: Oh, they're a shifty pack of rats. If I were you, I'd keep one hand on my wallet and the other on my gun whenever they're around.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Mr. House?
topics.response_text: House is an all-right kind of guy. Sure, he keeps a pretty tight grip on the reins, but Vegas is a wild horse, and you can't just give her her head.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Chairmen.
topics.response_text: Baby, we're only the coolest cats on the whole Strip. We been here the longest, we got the swankiest digs, and we got caps rolling in like the tide.

topics.topic_text: Flattering, but I don't like being tied down. How about some real work?
topics.response_text: You might have a jaw at Tommy Torini up in the Aces. He's always looking for talent scouts.

topics.topic_text: Baby, you're too good to me! How about some caps to buy myself something pretty?
topics.response_text: Ooh, I dig the way you think, doll. Here, go treat yourself.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Sure, whatever you want.

topics.topic_text: Not yet. Soon.
topics.response_text: All right, well, might want to get a move on, is all I'm saying.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, he's dead.
topics.response_text: Huh. Guess that makes me the boss. Ring-a-ding.

topics.topic_text: He bolted. But I'll find him.
topics.response_text: I hope so, kid. Last thing we need is that punk running around out there.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of Caesar's Legion?
topics.response_text: Oh, boy, those clowns. Listen up, kid, and listen good, I don't care how many fancy Latin names he gives himself, a thug ain't nothin' but a thug.

topics.topic_text: On second thought, let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Sure, kid, like what?

topics.topic_text: They took my guns at the security checkpoint. Can you set me up?
topics.response_text: Yeah, sure. Take your stuff back - you'll need it.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll do it.
topics.response_text: Here's your stuff back - in case Benny don't go quiet, you dig? I'll tell the boys to give you a pass to pack some heat.

topics.topic_text: Not yet, I want to take care of a few things first.
topics.response_text: Okay. Just let me know when you're ready.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, send him up to his room. I'll take care of him.
topics.response_text: Yeah, sure. I hope you know what you're doing, kid.

topics.topic_text: Yeah. Keep him distracted while I search his room.
topics.response_text: You got it. Anything else?

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure yet, but I had some other questions first.
topics.response_text: Sure, whatcha need?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Sure, kid, see ya.

combat.response_text: {Swank:}If I know my pal Benny, he's swinging with the Big Cat Upstairs as we speak. Or he's chasing some angel broad with cans as big as her halo! <Laughs>
